name: 'NO HAPPY' capxul 9.1
description:
Cryptoart as short video clips with sound. A phrase will appear as 3d text. Words evoke a blunt and dismal outlook contrasting with a sales-like and erotic aesthetic. They take inspiration from signage and advertising for strip clubs. Basically, the idea is to have something like a sign in front of a strip club that instead says a sobering depressing truth (taboo to say outloud). 1080x1080 mp4 

Motion graphics, video, words, music, content and modeling by capxul.
